review: This product does not work.  It will not show videos streaming on my iPad or laptop on the video screen.  All I get is a few pixels and no audio.  Somewhere in the documentation it says "experimental," which means they aren't sure if it will work or not.  It will not hold an internet connection.  It will show that I am connected, then when I play it says not connected.  This is worthless.  Either send me a new one that works, or give me my money back.  My wife bought the apple device and it works perfectly.
